entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:16 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 2:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of rain beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning and early afternoon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Windy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
